SwitchPreference.android:title: App volume
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled the volume is set to the chosen value when the app is being used

SeekBarPreference.android:title: Set app volume
SeekBarPreference.android:summary: Set volume for the app, volume will return to its original value when you leave the app

SwitchPreference.android:title: Show empty tiles as blank
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If no image is assigned to a button it will be white. By default the app logo is shown in empty buttons

SwitchPreference.android:title: Show text
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled you can assign some text to each button. This text will appear below the button. If enabled scrolling will also be enabled.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Enable scrolling
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If disabled first eight buttons will be visible without needing to scroll.
